about_the_game:
[h2]Discover "Wathan Games"[/h2]

"Wathan Games" is the ultimate quiz to energize your streams and create unforgettable interactions between streamers and their viewers. The chat becomes an indispensable ally, guiding the streamer through 5 thrilling levels of difficulty. With 5 unique artifacts to spice up each session, every game becomes an epic quest. Join the adventure with "Wathan Games" and transform your streaming experience!

Key Features

Rich and Varied Content: Explore over 10,000 questions of varying difficulties across 6 categories, including video games.

Thematic Seeds: Test your knowledge on specific topics with thematic question series.

Unique Graphics: Dive into a visually rich universe, entirely hand-drawn by "My name is Ebo", ensuring an immersive experience.

Global Leaderboard: Add a competitive dimension with a worldwide ranking.

Join "Wathan Games" and take part in a unique adventure where every session becomes an opportunity to strengthen bonds with the chat, share experiences, and compete with the rest of the world.
